resource_dependency.officeInfoSchema: Table 'office_info' with fields: id (primary key), name (string), address (text), phone (string), email (string), welcome_message (text), about_us_content (text)

home.title: Home - Clinical Office
home.description: Welcome to our clinical office. Learn more about our practice and services.

about.title: About Us - Clinical Office
about.description: Discover our mission, vision, and commitment to patient care.

services.title: Our Services - Clinical Office
services.description: Explore the comprehensive medical services we offer to our patients.

contact.title: Contact Us - Clinical Office
contact.description: Get in touch with us via phone, email, or our contact form.

function: Display general office information and a welcome message fetched dynamically from the database.
static_description: The homepage features a light cyan background with a centered header containing the clinicâ€™s name, followed by a welcome message retrieved from the database. Cadet blue UI components frame sections such as address, phone number, and email. SEO metadata includes title and description tags for search engine visibility.

interaction_and_states.description: On page load, the frontend makes an API request to '/api/office-info/homepage' to retrieve the welcome message and office details.

resource_dependency.seoMetaContent: { "about": { "title": "About Us - Clinical Office", "description": "Discover our mission, vision, and commitment to patient care." } }

function: Present detailed information about the clinical office, including its history and mission statement.
static_description: This page displays a light cyan background with cadet blue headings and paragraphs presenting the clinic's story and mission. Content is loaded from the 'about_us_content' field in the database.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon loading, the frontend fetches data from '/api/office-info/about-us' to populate the content area.

resource_dependency.servicesListSchema: Table 'services' with fields: id (primary key), name (string), description (text), duration_minutes (integer)
resource_dependency.seoMetaContent: { "services": { "title": "Our Services - Clinical Office", "description": "Explore the comprehensive medical services we offer to our patients." } }

function: List all medical services offered by the office with descriptions and estimated durations.
static_description: A responsive grid layout presents each service on a cadet blue card against a light cyan background. Each card contains the service name, description, and approximate time required.

interaction_and_states.description: On page load, the frontend calls '/api/services/list' to retrieve and render the full list of available services.

resource_dependency.contactFormSubmissionAPI: POST endpoint at '/api/contact/submit' expecting body with fields: name (string), email (string), subject (string), message (text)
resource_dependency.formValidationRules: Required fields: name, email, message. Email must match standard format.
resource_dependency.seoMetaContent: { "contact": { "title": "Contact Us - Clinical Office", "description": "Get in touch with us via phone, email, or our contact form." } }

function: Allow users to submit inquiries directly to the office through a validated contact form.
static_description: A centered form on a light cyan background allows visitors to enter their name, email, subject, and message. Submit button uses cadet blue styling. Validation messages appear inline when inputs fail checks.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers client-side validation. If valid, sends POST request to '/api/contact/submit'. Displays success/error feedback accordingly.
Each field validates upon losing focus, showing error messages if criteria aren't met.

function: Provide easy access to all major website sections through a consistent top navigation bar.
static_description: Fixed-position horizontal menu bar with links styled in cadet blue over a light cyan background. Links include Home, About Us, Services, and Contact Us.

interaction_and_states.description: Navigates to the selected page without reloading the entire application.
Highlights the hovered link with a subtle underline effect while maintaining cadet blue color.

function: Apply global styles with light cyan backgrounds and cadet blue UI elements.
static_description: All pages utilize CSS variables setting background color to light cyan (#E0FFFF) and component colors to cadet blue (#5F9EA0). Consistent typography and spacing enhance readability.

function: Ensure cross-device compatibility with responsive layouts tailored for desktop and mobile viewing.
static_description: Media queries adjust font sizes, padding, margins, and element stacking order based on screen width. Navigation collapses into hamburger menu on small screens.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout adjusts smoothly between breakpoints to maintain usability and aesthetics across device types.

function: Process incoming contact form submissions securely and store them in the database.
static_description: Backend receives POST requests at '/api/contact/submit', parses input data, performs server-side validation, then inserts records into the 'contact_submissions' table.

interaction_and_states.description: Server logs the submission, stores it in PostgreSQL under 'contact_submissions', and returns HTTP 200 OK or appropriate error code.

function: Establish secure connection to PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables.
static_description: Database connection initialized during backend startup using provided credentials. Tables created automatically if missing.

function: Serve dynamic content from backend endpoints to corresponding frontend views.
static_description: Frontend components make asynchronous GET requests to defined routes to populate office info, about us copy, and services listings.

interaction_and_states.description: Each component triggers useEffect hook calling respective API endpoint to fetch and set local state.

function: Configure package.json scripts to simplify installation of frontend and backend dependencies together.
static_description: 'scripts' block defines 'install:all' which runs npm install in both frontend and backend directories sequentially.

function: Enable simultaneous development of frontend and backend using a unified command.
static_description: 'scripts' block defines 'dev' which utilizes concurrently to launch React dev server and Node.js backend simultaneously.

function: Render informational content statically where no interactivity or dynamic updates are needed.
static_description: Pages like About Us and Services initially render HTML content returned from the backend before hydration occurs.

resource_dependency.validationLibrary: Use Yup schema definitions for contact form validation logic

function: Prevent invalid entries in the contact form by enforcing input constraints.
static_description: Client-side validation prevents submission until required fields are filled correctly. Real-time hints guide corrections.

interaction_and_states.description: Validates individual field and displays immediate feedback beneath it.
Runs complete validation suite; blocks submission and highlights errors if any exist.

function: Improve discoverability of webpages through optimized SEO metadata.
static_description: Each route injects unique <title> and <meta description> tags generated from pre-defined templates stored in configuration files.

interaction_and_states.description: Updates document head with relevant SEO metadata matching current page context.
